thread.title: Eric Cantona destroys Manchester City and John Stones in his latest 'Commissioner of Football' rant
thread.title_full: Eric Cantona destroys Manchester City and John Stones in his latest 'Commissioner of Football' rant

author: Thomas Bristow
title: Eric Cantona destroys Manchester City and John Stones in his latest 'Commissioner of Football' rant
text:
Eric Cantona destroys Manchester City and John Stones in his latest 'Commissioner of Football' rant The Manchester United legend has spoken out again while sitting in a throne with an unbuttoned shirt Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Eric Cantona slams Manchester City and John Stones Share this video Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Eric Cantona has launched a damning attack on Manchester City and John Stones in his latest 'Commissioner of Football' rant. 
The Manchester United legend, who appointed himself the 'Commissioner of Football', gave his views on the Premier League club during his latest musings for Eurosport . 
The Frenchman was speaking about City's Champions League exit last week. 
Pep Guardiola's men lost their second leg to Monaco 3-1, losing the tie 6-6 on aggregate - and were subsequently knocked out at the last-16 stage. 
Cantona didn't hold back with his assessment. Cantona pulls no punches (Photo: Eurosport) 
He said: "Manchester Cityâ€™s defence are not the only one to blame for their very own infamous Brexit . 
"We know now why John Stones was so expensive: because he comes with a fully equipped trailer that he pulls behind him when he plays. John Stones didn't enjoy his experience in Monaco (Photo: REUTERS) 
"And the attack! Not a single shot in the first 45 minutes. The question now is not who is going to leave when summer comes, but rather, who is going to stay?" 
Ouch.
